What to do: Lie on your back, with feet flat on the floor and knees bent at 90ยบ
Keep hands behind head, and chin neutral
Exhale and use your abs to crunch up. Hold for 1-2 seconds
Slowly return to floor and immediately crunch again, keeping your abs contracted
Do NOT: Look down as your crunch. This can strain your neck
Use your hands to pull on neck, when crunching
